param.name: RESAMPLING
param.dialogReference:
Resampling

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Nearest Neighbour

[1] Bilinear Interpolation

[2] Bicubic Spline Interpolation

[3] B-Spline Interpolation

Default: 3

param.name: LENGTHS
param.dialogReference:
Wave Lengths

Text

Default: 0.485 0.56 0.66 0.83 1.65 2.215 11.45

Space separated wave lengths ordered corresponding to the bands in input list. If empty a simple enumeration will be used instead.
